name: Flying Sakuras Free - Live classic sweat with pink bird game App
name_original: Flying Sakuras Free - Live classic sweat with pink bird game App
description:
Fly over and follow the falling sakura flowers.

Little bird is learning how to fly. Help little bat navigate through the caves by flapping its wings. Be warned, it gets more difficult as you venture deeper in to the cave.

Features:
- Compete with your friends on the Game Center Leaderboard.
- Scores are saved locally when there is no connection and sent the next time you are connected to the internet.
- Levels get more challenging as you progress.
